title: Mrs. Morgan Rescues... Two Senior Dogs!
description: Mrs. Morgan Rescues... Two Senior Dogs! is the fourth story in a series created for independent readers ages eight and up. Younger readers may enjoy this book if it is read to them.Mrs. Morgan lives in Savannah, Georgia. She is a licensed wildlife rehabilitator and rescues and fosters both wild and domestic animals. This story is about two older dogs Roscoe and Boscoe. Their owner has died and her daughter is leaving town and can't take the dogs right away. With the help of her next door neighbor, Bree, Mrs. Morgan takes care of the dogs. Mrs. Morgan takes the dogs to three elementary schools to teach children about adopting senior pets.These stories are meant to encourage compassion and caring towards all animals.This short story has 3,981 words and a few pictures. It is not a picture book but rather the pictures are meant to enhance the story.
author: Bonnie  Davis
